channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Quotation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Quotation

item.title: CVE-2022-22734|2024-08-03T03:21:48.945Z -- unknown -- simple%20quotation
item.description: The Simple Quotation WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not have CSRF check when creating or editing a quote and does not sanitise and escape Quotes. As a result, attacker could make a logged in admin create or edit arbitrary quote, and put Cross-Site Scripting payloads in them

item.title: CVE-2022-22735|2024-08-03T03:21:48.905Z -- unknown -- simple%20quotation
item.description: The Simple Quotation WordPress plugin through 1.3.2 does not have authorisation (and CSRF) checks in various of its AJAX actions and is lacking escaping of user data when using it in SQL statements, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to perform SQL injection attacks
